_meta._description: Shopfloor layout configuration with grid and module positions
_meta._usage_omf2: Used by CCUGateway for physical layout operations and module positioning

_changelog.v2.1: Enhanced route visualization with FTS/AGV icon rendering. Added PRODUCT_SVG_BASE_SIZE (200px) standard for consistent workpiece rendering. Documented AGV route display implementation.
_changelog.v2.0: BREAKING: Migrated empty_positions to fixed_positions structure with canonical asset keys. Legacy EMPTY1/EMPTY2 keys no longer supported in productive code.
_changelog.v1.1: Renamed EMPTY1/EMPTY2 to COMPANY/SOFTWARE for better domain semantics. Asset Manager maintains backward compatibility.

_migration_notes.v2.1: Route visualization enhanced with FTS icon rendering along AGV paths. Product SVGs now use PRODUCT_SVG_BASE_SIZE=200px standard. Warehouse 3x3 grid enforced via CSS grid-template-columns. No breaking changes to config structure.
_migration_notes.v2.0: Applications using empty_positions must migrate to fixed_positions structure. Asset keys changed from direct names (e.g., 'ORBIS') to canonical format (e.g., 'COMPANY_rectangle'). Legacy EMPTY1/EMPTY2 keys removed from productive asset lookup.

_implementation.route_computation: route_utils.build_graph() indexes nodes by both id and serialNumber. compute_route() accepts either identifier with flexible lookup.
_implementation.identifier_resolution: Module identifiers support: serialNumber (e.g., 'SVR4H73275'), id (e.g., 'DPS'), and intersection ids (e.g., '1', '2'). Roads connect via primary keys (serialNumbers).
_implementation.route_rendering: SVG overlay with polyline for route path. AGV marker (FTS icon ic_ft_fts.svg) rendered at progress point along route.
_implementation.agv_progress: Float 0.0-1.0 representing position along route. Calculated via point_on_polyline() for smooth animation.
_implementation.cell_size: 200x200px grid cells. Route points computed in pixel coordinates for SVG rendering.

_troubleshooting.start_goal_not_found: Check module.id and module.serialNumber match roads[].from/to. Use flexible lookup in compute_route().
_troubleshooting.route_not_displayed: Verify route_points passed to show_shopfloor_layout() and SVG overlay rendered.
_troubleshooting.agv_icon_missing: Confirm getAssetFile('FTS') returns valid path to ic_ft_fts.svg.

_product_svg_sizing._container_policy: All product SVGs rendered in 200x200px container. Non-square SVGs: width=200px, height proportional.
_product_svg_sizing._scale_support: Optional scale parameter: scale=1.5 -> 300x300px container, scale=0.5 -> 100x100px container.
_product_svg_sizing._warehouse_grid: 3x3 grid enforced via CSS grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 200px). Cell size matches PRODUCT_SVG_BASE_SIZE.
